00018 import sys
00019 import getopt
00020 import os
00021 import math
00022 
00023 firstx = []
00024 firsty = []
00025 secondx = []
00026 secondy = []
00027 
00028 outfile = ""
00029 
00030 options = ["adressc=", "infile=", "outfile=","help"]
00031 
00032 try:
00033     opts, args = getopt.getopt(sys.argv[1:], "", options)
00034 except getopt.GetoptError, err:
00035     # print help information and exit:
00036     print str(err) # will print something like "option -a not recognized"
00037     print options
00038     sys.exit(2)
00039 for o, a in opts:
00040     if o == "--help":
00041       print """%(name)s, version %(ver)s 
00042 This script symmetrizes the density around --adressc for thermodynamic force iteration
00043 
00044 Usage: %(name)s 
00045 Allowed options:
00046     --adressc X.X     center of the adress zone (x-value)
00047     --infile FILE     input file
00048     --outfile FILE    output file
00049 """ % {'name': os.path.basename(sys.argv[0]),'ver': '%version%'}
00050       sys.exit(0)
00051     elif o == "-v":
00052         verbose = True
00053     elif o == "--adressc":
00054         adressc = float(a)
00055     elif o in ("--infile"):
00056         infile = a
00057     elif o in ("--outfile"):
00058         outfile = a
00059     else:
00060         print options
00061         assert False, "unhandled option"
00062 
00063 for line in open(infile,"r").readlines():
00064         if line[0] != "@" and line[0] != "#":
00065                 values = line.split()
00066                 if float(values[0]) <= adressc:
00067                         firstx.append(float(values[0]))
00068                         firsty.append(float(values[1]))
00069                         if float(values[0]) == adressc:
00070                             secondx.append(float(values[0])-adressc)
00071                             secondy.append(float(values[1]))
00072                 else:
00073                        
00074                         if len(firstx)-1-len(secondx) >= 0 and (len(firstx)-1-len(secondx)) < len (firsty):
00075                             secondx.append(float(values[0])-adressc) 
00076                             secondy.append( 0.5*(firsty[len(firstx)-len(secondx)]+(float(values[1]))) )
00077                         else:
00078                             print "Warning: symmetrize_density.pl : adressc not in center of data", line
00079                             print "index", len(firstx)-len(secondx)
00080 
00081 f = open(outfile,"w")
00082 i=0
00083 for x in secondx:
00084     f.write('%15.10e %15.10e i\n' % (x, secondy[i]))
00085     i=i+1
